description: Add style and elegance to your desktop with this 23-inch monitor, which features a translucent aquamarine base with brushed anodized aluminum accents, and a micro-thin profile. The HP x2301 delivers Full HD viewing with less glare and easily connects to desktop or notebook PCs. It also has an HDMI input so you can connect to a TV or other video source. Tilt adjustment gives you a comfortable view, and with Plug & Play you're up and running quickly.
title: HP x2301 23-Inch Micro Thin LED Monitor
